title: clone: [ERROR] object.__init__() takes exactly one argument (the instance to initialize) (TypeError)

labels.name: severity-minor
labels.description: a problem which doesn't affect the package's usefulness, and is presumably trivial to fix

body:
```
$> datalad clone drogon:/mnt/backup/dandi/dandiarchive-s3-backup
[INFO   ] Cloning drogon:/mnt/backup/dandi/dandiarchive-s3-backup into '/tmp/dandiarchive-s3-backup' 
[INFO   ] [ERROR] object.__init__() takes exactly one argument (the instance to initialize) (TypeError)                                                                                                                            
[INFO   ] [ERROR] object.__init__() takes exactly one argument (the instance to initialize) (TypeError) 
[INFO   ]   external special remote protocol error, unexpectedly received "" (unable to parse command) 
install(ok): /tmp/dandiarchive-s3-backup (dataset)
```
yet to figure out what is going on.  Seems to complete ok, present with even 0.11.8.dev61 (as well as current master)
